data.eml:eml: The freshwater crabs of Danum Valley Conservation Area in Sabah, East Malaysia, with a description of a new species of Thelphusula Bott, 1969 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Gecarcinucidae, Potamidae, Sesarmidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Ng, Paul Y. C. (2018): The freshwater crabs of Danum Valley Conservation Area in Sabah, East Malaysia, with a description of a new species of Thelphusula Bott, 1969 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Gecarcinucidae, Potamidae, Sesarmidae). ZooKeys 760: 89-112, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.760.24787, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.760.24787
